original_text: He cast two pillars of bronze. Eighteen cubits was the height of one pillar, and a line of twelve cubits measured its circumference. It was hollow, and its thickness was four fingers. The second pillar was the same.
korean_text: 그가 놋기둥 둘을 만들었으니 그 높이는 각각 십팔 규빗이라 각각 십이 규빗 되는 줄을 두를 만하며

sentences.original_text: He cast two pillars of bronze.
Eighteen cubits was the height of one pillar
and a line of twelve cubits measured its circumference.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 둘레는 열두 규빗 되는 줄로 재었다.

sentences.original_text: and its thickness was four fingers.
The second pillar was the same.
